unnormalised: **Manufacturing & Supply Chain: Quality Control Concerns Rise in Tiruchirappalli Auto Parts Sector**
normalised: **Manufacturing and Supply Chain: Quality Control Concerns Rise in Tiruchirappalli Auto Parts Sector**

unnormalised: Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu - Concerns are mounting regarding quality control within the automotive parts manufacturing sector in and around Tiruchirappalli. Recent inspections by the Quality Council of India (QCI) revealed inconsistencies in material standards at several SME units.
normalised: Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu - Concerns are mounting regarding quality control within the automotive parts manufacturing sector in and around Tiruchirappalli. Recent inspections by the Quality Council of India (Q C I) revealed inconsistencies in material standards at several S M E units.

unnormalised: Dr. Meena Iyer, a lead auditor with QCI, stated that the lack of standardized testing procedures and inadequate calibration of machinery are contributing factors. "We observed instances where vendors were using substandard steel, impacting the long-term durability of components," she noted.
normalised: Doctor Meena Iyer, a lead auditor with Q C I, stated that the lack of standardized testing procedures and inadequate calibration of machinery are contributing factors. unnormalised: The Confederation of Indian Industry (CII), Tiruchirappalli chapter, has announced a series of workshops aimed at upskilling workers and implementing stricter quality protocols. Rs. 5 crore has been allocated by the Tamil Nadu government for this initiative, which includes setting up a 10,000 sq ft testing facility near the airport.

unnormalised: Industry experts fear these lapses could damage the reputation of ‘Made in India’ auto parts, especially those destined for export. Furthermore, faulty components could lead to recalls, costing manufacturers millions in lost revenue and impacting consumer confidence. The focus now shifts to rigorous adherence to quality benchmarks and consistent monitoring across the supply chain.
